channel.title: admin on Alok Tripathy
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Alok Tripathy

item.description: I’m a Member of Technical Staff at Essential AI, where we are pushing the capabilities of fully open-source LLMs. I recently graduated with a CS Ph.D. from UC Berkeley and Lawrence Berkeley National Lab. My dissertation focused on scaling large GNN models and applying them to sciences, particularly high-energy physics. I was very thankful to be advised by the wonderful Aydın Buluç and Kathy Yelick during this time. In the past, I worked on accelerating graph analytics on GPUs with Oded Green and David Bader at Georgia Tech.
